name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.4-2a9a5f6016292c6255572dd1dd565c5c5641c12d "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
